plot outline: An emotionless and offish portrait of the Warsaw Central Railway Station, a flagship development of ruling communist party in the seventies. A platform - someone asleep, someone waiting for a train, someone arriving - and the cameras installed there are watching everyone and everything. Terrifying and creepy.
title: Railway Station
plot: An emotionless and offish portrait of the Warsaw Central _Railway Station_ (qv), a flagship development of PZPR in the seventies.
